title: Standing male figure, one of a set of nine
description: standing male figure wearing a robe with traces of red pigment; small flat hat on crown of head; proper L hand not visible; proper R hand is resting on waist at front; L2005.56.8.1-4 and L2005.58.2.1-5 are the set of nine
creditline: Lent by David and Flinnina Dewey
